commit.message:
localefwd.h (locale::_Impl): Scope out types to public.


2000-09-09  Benjamin Kosnik  <bkoz@purist.soma.redhat.com>

	* bits/localefwd.h (locale::_Impl): Scope out types to public.
	(locale): Make _Impl declaration public.

From-SVN: r36283
